name: io.github.danishashko/make-mcp
description: Unofficial MCP server for Make.com automation - build, validate & deploy scenarios via AI

environmentVariables.description: Make.com API key for scenario deployment (optional - only needed for create_scenario tool)
environmentVariables.name: MAKE_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Make.com Team ID for scenario deployment (optional)
environmentVariables.name: MAKE_TEAM_ID

environmentVariables.description: Make.com API URL - defaults to https://eu1.make.com/api/v2 (optional)
environmentVariables.name: MAKE_API_URL

environmentVariables.description: Log level - error, info, or debug (optional, defaults to error)
environmentVariables.name: LOG_LEVEL
